hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:It is not allowable for a woman to keep (voluntary) fast when her husband is present without his permission, and she may not allow anyone to enter his house without his permission

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَرْأَةِ تَصُومُ بِغَيْرِ إِذْنِ زَوْجِهَا
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Fasting Without Permission Of Her Husband
